Pre-Game Insights: Experts anticipate an epic cricketing spectacle between two cricket powerhouses, Australia and India, on October 8, 2023, at the MA Chidambaram Stadium.
Australia has often held the upper hand in this historic rivalry, securing victory on 8 occasions, firmly establishing their dominance.
India enters the ICC World Cup 2023 as one of the frontrunners, bolstered by a talented squad, and field a formidable team with home advantage.

Australia boasts a remarkable history of success in World Cup tournaments, having clinched the prestigious title on five occasions, and their legacy of success and reputation for fearless cricket make them an undeniable force in the cricketing realm.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chepauk Stadium pitch traditionally favours spin bowlers, creating a heaven for spinners, and teams would be wise to opt for bowling attacks that heavily feature spin to exploit these conditions.
A total of 270-280 runs would be considered as a competitive score in this setting.
India possesses a strong batting lineup, although the potential absence of Shubman Gill in the opening game due to health concerns could pose a challenge.
Australia, on the contrary, appears to be in a miss and a hit form, with key players like David Warner and Mitchel Marsh performing well.
Others: The match will be played on Sunday, October 8, at 2:00 PM (IST) and will be live streamed on Disney+ Hotstar app and website, and broadcast on Star Sports Network.
